subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Overall Tour de France leader Fabian Cancellara has benefited from the work of his CSC teammates.  But what happens when Carlos Sastre, the team’s best hope for an overall victory, needs their help?
snippet: Overall Tour de France leader Fabian Cancellara has benefited from the work of his CSC teammates.  But what happens when Carlos Sastre, the team’s best hope for an overall victory, needs their help?
